original_text: For if Joshua had given them rest, God would not have spoken later about another day.
korean_text: 만일 여호수아가 그들에게 안식을 주었더라면 그 후에 다른 날을 말씀하지 아니하셨으리라

sentences.original_text: For if Joshua had given them rest
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 만약 여호수아가 그들에게 안식을 주었다면

sentences.original_text: God would not have spoken later
